meanings.definition: A note added to a text, book, or diagram providing explanation or comment.
meanings.sent1: I wrote an annotation in my book to help me understand the story better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to add an annotation to our essays to explain our reasoning.
meanings.sent3: My friend left a funny annotation in my textbook, making me laugh during class.
meanings.sent4: Her annotations in the margins of the document shed light on its hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: The colorful annotations in the textbook made studying more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The action of annotating text or a diagram.
meanings.sent1: During the lecture, the professor explained the importance of annotation in studying.
meanings.sent2: Her quick annotation of the map helped us navigate through the city easily.
meanings.sent3: I tried to do the annotation dance while studying, but it was more distracting than helpful.
meanings.sent4: The annotation of the blueprint revealed the architect's creative process.
meanings.sent5: His annotation of the painting highlighted the artist's attention to detail.
